title: The Night They Took Miss Beautiful (1977, Drama) Victoria Principal, Gary Collins | Movie

sources.title: The Night They Took Miss Beautiful (1977, Drama) Victoria Principal, Gary Collins | Movie
sources.description:
Beauty, Brains, and Bio-Terror: One Deadly Mission.
Criminals hijack an airplane carrying five glamorous beauty contest finalists, but unknowingly they’ve also kidnapped a government agent carrying a dangerous virus that is to be used in bacterial warfare.

Original title: The Night They Took Miss Beautiful (1977)

Director: Robert Michael Lewis
Writer: Lou LaRose, George Lefferts
Stars: Gary Collins, Chuck Connors, Henry Gibson, Victoria Principal & also features 3 Playmates: Stella Stevens, Lillian Müller, and Rosanne Katon
Genre: Drama, Thriller

00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
02:30 Annual beauty pageant competition hosted in Miami beach, showcasing finalists and their talents.
07:49 A behind-the-scenes look at a beauty pageant competition and the challenges faced by the contestants.
12:18 A dramatic event unfolds during a beauty pageant competition involving a missing flight and its consequences.
20:15 Emergency landing due to cabin pressure issue leads to tense moments and eventual safe evacuation.
28:46 Summary of a dramatic incident involving a missing airplane and FBI involvement.
34:49 Discussion of a plan involving a ransom demand for the release of hostages and a possible escape.
45:15 Comedic beauty pageant competition with unexpected consequences unfolds in a dramatic setting.
52:11 A dangerous virus plot unfolds on a hijacked flight, putting the USA at risk of destruction.
55:45 A group discusses a dangerous situation involving a virus and a missing man, leading to a potential threat to a friendly country.
1:01:59 A dramatic conversation unfolds between characters discussing a plan involving a deserted base in the Keys.
1:16:33 Drama unfolds as hostages are taken in a high-stakes situation, leading to negotiations and a potential rescue attempt.
1:21:33 A tense negotiation unfolds as a plane hijacking plot is foiled, culminating in a dramatic showdown.
1:31:14 Drama unfolds as a beauty pageant contestant faces danger and rescue in a thrilling sequence of events.
